response.original_title: A Walk On Part In The War
response.overview: A proof of concept for a Second World War feature film based on the real life misadventures of my father, created using a hybrid narrative style, mixing live action with graphics and illustration inspired by the era and combined using motion design techniques. It's designed to be affordable, with a low environmental impact and offering huge creative potential.
response.tagline: Less honourable minutes of an otherwise finest hour.
response.title: A Walk On Part In The War
